backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with document, session, channel, messaging, file, and image-related types and includes blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing UI changes to the SessionPage header along with linked files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Outlines regression tests for player‑document file and image uploads, including expected behavior, errors, and cross‑document checks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that initializes theme mode from localStorage and mounts the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app logic handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, logout, and routing between Lobby and Session screens.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches application errors and displays a fallback UI with reload and data‑clearing options.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat UI for a channel supporting text, roll commands, image uploads, replies, and auto‑scrolling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders a single chat message with avatar, replies, images, long‑press actions, and user identity handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments with add and delete functionality, handling permissions and error states.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses document text for file markers and renders inline images or downloadable file attachments.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Document editor with save, file upload, image insertion, preview mode, and change tracking.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog for selecting, validating, and uploading an image with an optional title.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Editor UI for viewing, editing, uploading files/images to, and managing visibility of a player document.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Avatar component that displays an image or fallback initials based on user name and size.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Profile picture management UI allowing upload, validation, progress tracking, and removal.
frontend/src/components/profile/QuickCha: Dialog for editing a temporary chat profile including display name and avatar image.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting chat channels with validation and async actions.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Provides dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking session documents using actor calls with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Implements export and import controls for session data, including file parsing, confirmation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Contains dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting member channels with mutation hooks and basic validation.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Handles creation and management of player-owned documents, including visibility settings and menu actions for rename and delete.
Displays a list of player documents, supports creation via a sub-dialog, and allows selecting documents for use.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog component for listing, creating, renaming, selecting, and deleting session documents with related state and API calls.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar UI for navigating channels and settings within a session, supporting collapse, profile access, and channel management dialogs.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings view for adjusting user preferences, managing templates, theme, background, and resetting all settings before entering a lobby.
frontend/src/components/settings/UIScale: Popover for adjusting UI scale via slider or input, with clamping, persistence, and reset functionality.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, session info, and document content.
Context provider for loading, storing, updating, and resetting user preferences including theme application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Hooks for fetching, adding, deleting, and updating document comments with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Hooks for listing, retrieving, and uploading document files using the backend actor with validation and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: React-query hooks to list and add images to session or player documents, invalidating related queries on mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and hooks for login, logout, and identity lifecycle using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: React-query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, deleting, and updating visibility of player documents.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Custom hook that runs a callback on a set interval while enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from PreferencesContext.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickChatProfile.t: Manages local quick chat profile loading, saving, and clearing with state and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Fetches session, channels, members' channels, and messages with polling plus mutations for managing member channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: React-query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, and deleting session documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user’s display name from profile or falls back to a shortened principal string.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and update caller or arbitrary user profiles, including saving and removing profile pictures.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and layout styles for chat and session views.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific localStorage keys and all sessionStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Provides utilities to create, parse, insert, and remove file marker tags in text content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Provides functions to manage image marker tags, including creation, parsing, insertion, and removal.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user preferences with validation and clamping for UI scale.
frontend/src/lib/quickChatProfileStorage: Manages quick chat profile storage with validation for structure, image format, and size.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Performs basic validation on RPG roll command patterns and returns validity results.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses session export JSON files with version validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves session context data in localStorage, converting sessionId to bigint.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session templates stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable time or date-time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity provider and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Implements lobby UI for hosting or joining sessions, handling forms, preferences, templating, and session creation.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: React page managing session state, switching views between channels and documents, and handling sidebar/dialog interactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugins for the project's UI theme.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, issues, and feature requests related to UI layout changes in the Session page.
